mapper.select: select ec.id,ec.title,ec.price,ec.lesson_num as lessonNum,ecd.description, et.name as teacherName,es.title as subjectLevelOne,es2.title as subjectLevelTwo,ec.cover from edu_course ec left join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id=et.id left join edu_subject es on es.id=ec.subject_parent_id left join edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_id=es2.id left join edu_course_description ecd on ecd.id=ec.id where ec.id=#{id}
